title: KPD still investigating fatal shooting of 2-year-old
content:
Several questions still surround the shooting, including whether anyone was arrested in the shooting, if the shooter was licensed to carry a gun at the time of the shooting and the relationship between the women having the argument at the time of the shooting.
The shooting occurred in the 4600 block of Golden Gate Drive, which is off of South Clear Creek Road near the Killeen/Fort Hood Regional Airport in an upper-middle class residential neighborhood. The houses are between single- and two-story buildings and the lawns are well maintained.
Police responded to the scene about 2:30 p.m. Saturday after receiving a 911 call about a shooting. The boy was pronounced dead at 4:53 p.m. at McLane’s Children’s Hospital in Temple.
